sentences.sContent: The whole family was sitting around the dinner table.
The Romans built a defensive wall around the city.
sentences.sCn: 罗马人在城市周围筑起一道防御墙。

sentences.sContent: She wore a beautiful silk shawl around her shoulders.
sentences.sCn: 她在肩上围了一条漂亮的真丝披肩。

sentences.sContent: People crowded around to see what was happening.
We would hear the birds singing all around us.
sentences.sCn: 我们会听见四周鸟儿在唱歌。

phrases.pCn: 四处走动；供应；（消息）流传
[美口]阅历多；老于世故；遍布各地

trans.tranCn: 在周围，在附近；到处，四周；大约
trans.tranOther: surrounding or on all sides of something or someone

trans.tranCn: 在…各处， 遍及； 在…四周； 在
